backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing posts with IDs, content, optional media, hashtags, and timestamps, including creation and querying features.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a header logo update tied to SiteHeader.tsx with metadata and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files, describing structure and 90s-themed styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with branding, metadata, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout including header, composer, hashtag filter, feed, and themed footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky retro-styled header with updated neon wordmark logo and theme toggle button.
frontend/src/components/posts/HashtagFil: Hashtag filtering UI with input, filter button, and active filter display.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays an individual post with content, optional media, hashtags, and timestamp, supporting hashtag clicks.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCompos: UI component for creating posts, handling text, hashtags, media upload, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostDetail: Dialog showing full post details including content, media, hashtags, and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostFeed.t: Fetches and displays a list of posts with loading/error states and opens post details on click.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePost.ts: Mutation hook that sends new posts to the backend and refreshes post queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Query hook fetching all posts or hashtag-filtered posts, sorted by timestamp.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom 90s-style UI theme with retro panel, badge, and button utilities.
frontend/src/lib/hashtags.ts: Parses and normalizes hashtags from user input, removing invalid characters and duplicates.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging and formatting timestamps into human-readable strings.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Implements post validation, checking content length, empty posts, and media type/size limits.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, feature set, schema version, and implemented functionality.
